trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_SEQ_00<tab>The dour dwarf is raring to do his part to help the cause─and for this he needs your help.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_TODO_00<tab>Obtain exotic paraphernalia in the Puppets' Bunker.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the exotic paraphernalia to the dour dwarf.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERD03954_000_001<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_010<tab>I appreciate you letting me join you...and apologize for my earlier rudeness. Not to make an excuse, but it's been a trying time for us all.

TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_011<tab>Now, I've been pondering the ways in which I might contribute to the rebuilding effort. While I don't have many talents─not outside of those considered normal for a dwarf such as drinking, at any rate─people do say that I have the gift of the gab.

TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_012<tab>Using this gift, I've a mind to peddle wares in the outside world to earn coin to put towards our work. There's just one problem: at the moment, we don't have anything that would fetch a halfway decent price.

TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_013<tab>No, we need something more unusual and exotic than our grog and automata. And as I racked my beard for ideas, it came to me: what could be more unusual and exotic than objects from another world?

TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_014<tab>The machines have a base inside the crater, and I understand it's brimming with all manner of their paraphernalia. Such items are guaranteed to fetch a high price─we just need someone to venture in to retrieve them: you!
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_A1_000_001<tab>If you're not fussed about what I bring back...
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_A1_000_002<tab>I'm not sure if they'd be worth <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> much...

TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_016<tab>As long as it's unusual, I'm confident I can spin a sales pitch for it. Oh yes, the coinbags of Eulmore would trip over themselves for such rare curios.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_017<tab>So just bring back the items, and leave the rest to me. Our coffers will be full before you know it!
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_020<tab>How fares the search in the crater? Remember, I'm not fussed about what you bring back as long as it's unusual.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_100<tab>Back from the crater, are you? Come, come, show me what you were able to find.

TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_101<tab>Oho, strange and wondrous items, all! I'll examine everything closely before I attempt to peddle them, but these ought to be snapped up with nary a fuss.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_102<tab>My thanks for bringing these. Now I can do my little part for our village.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_103<tab>Ah, and before I forget, the chief was asking for you earlier. If you have a moment, do go and see what he wants.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_105<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_100_103<tab>The chief has been asking for you. If you have a moment, do go and see what he wants.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERD03954_000_150<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_160<tab>Ah, I was wondering when you would come by again.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_100_161<tab>The items you brought back last time are perfect, but I'm hoping to have more stock before I head to Eulmore to do my peddling.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_161<tab>Could I trouble you to go on another foray into the crater?
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_165<tab>With just a few more items from the crater, I'll have enough stock to make it worth setting out to do my peddling. My thanks in advance.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_250<tab>There you are. Were you able to find anything else of interest?
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_251<tab>Marvelous! With the addition of this little lot, I'm now ready to set forth!

TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_252<tab>If truth be told, I'm a little daunted by the prospect of going all the way to Eulmore. But if I have confidence in myself─and some grog is always good for that─I'm sure that all will be well.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_253<tab>Oh yes, I'll see to it our wares fetch the best coin they can, and prove to everyone that I'm worth more than the ale I can hold.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_254<tab>Thanks for all your help, my friend. I'll be fine from here, and you can let the chief know as much.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERB03954_000_255<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA522_04051_VILLAGERD03954_000_260<tab>To be deleted.
